Name: Argentata
Characteristics: Italian heirloom type, silvery white midribs and savoyed deep green broad leaves, mild and sweet flavor.

Name: Burpees Rhubarb Chard (Ruby Chard)
Characteristics: reddish green crumpled leaves and bright red, wide petioles with orange tint.
Similar: Crimson Giant or Burbank's Rainbow cultivar.
Parentage: selection from Crimson Giant Swiss Chard.

Name: Fordhook Giant
Characteristics: leaves dark green, savoyed, white veins, stems broad and white, heat resistant, fresh market use.

Name: Large White Ribbed
Characteristics: leaves dark green, smooth, white veins, stems broad and smooth, white, slightly flattened.

Name: Paros
Characteristics: tall, shiny, upright green leaves on thick white stalks, mild and sweet flavor.

Name: Rainbow
Characteristics: delicious Swiss chard with multicolored stems, red, pink, striped, white, orange, yellow, and lemon.

Name: Ruby Red
Characteristics: leaves deep green, savoyed, red veins, stems bright red and slightly flat, fresh market use.

Name: Silverado
Characteristics: glossy dark green leaves and white stems, compact habit, excellent flavor.
